entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NodeJS projects are still built when passing /p:BuildNodeJS=false when nodejs is installed #43310
  • Perf improvement: https #43305
  • Content not being posted to textarea ASP.NET Core #43301
  • RateLimitingMiddleware test improvements #43298
    7.0-rc2
  • Swagger / OpenAPI support in gRPC JSON transcoding #43294
  • Blazor WASM MSAL authentication not working when app is trimmed #43293
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Accessing `session` within another controller - ASP.NET Core 6 Web API #43288
  • What cause error "A connection that was expected to be kept alive was closed by the server" #43287
  • Perf improvement: https, json_actix, mvc #43284
  • [BlazorWasm] Too much is trimmed when not building web host #43283
    Backlog

Closed

  • Enable zero byte reads for StreamPipeReader usage in ASP.NET Core #42829
    7.0-rc1
  • QuicTransportOptions.IdleTimeout vs KestrelServerLimits.KeepAliveTimeout #34955
    7.0-rc1
  • Update SQL Connection String in Blazor WASM Connection to `DataSource=<value>` #42635
    7.0-rc1
  • MapHealthChecks().AllowAnonymous() not working #43042
    7.0-rc1
  • Using WithSummary() for Minimal API endpoints does not render when using Swashbuckle.AspNetCore #40753
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Localised number format and wrong input type for decimal fields #6566
    7.0-rc1
  • ASP.Net Core MVC Validation at Model Level #43244
  • Issue getting protected route to work in 6.0 but works in 5.0 #43296
  • IIS Applications hosting (in site-folder) is not working for Blazor Server deployment #43161
  • Can I auto switch blazor server to wasm when user view web pages? #43262
  • Why are methods that are not Async suffixed with Async in ProtectedBrowserStorage class? #43295
  • API additions for RateLimitingMiddleware #42667
    7.0-rc1
  • Allow direct configuration of authorization policies via endpoint metadata #39840
    7.0.0
  • Page not found after changing chtml file #43116
  • Update Blazor WebAssembly template to include comment linking to doc about enabling cross-origin isolation #43194
    7.0-rc1
  • The SPA default page middleware could not return the default page '/index.html' because it was not found, and no other middleware handled the request. #42888
  • Upgrading a Blazor WASM project from .NET 6 to .NET 7 causes Blazor to incorrectly load .NET in Javascript #43286

PullRequests

Created

  • Follow-ups to 'Fix MVC form data binding localization' (#43182) #43309
    area-mvc
  • Update Major Version/TFM doc #43308
  • Update branding to 8.0.0-alpha1 #43307
  • Add npmrc files #43303
  • Increase Kestrel's default HTTP/2 upload window sizes #43302
    area-runtime
  • [SignalR] [JS Client] Retry HTTP request on auth failure #43300
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript
  • Improve code using pattern matching #43285
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Remove enable HTTP/3 client option #43282
    area-runtime
  • Add QUIC event source logging to flakey test #43281
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Reuse failed auth results in AuthN #43269
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-rc1
  • Default to zero byte reads when we use PipeReader.Create #43276
    7.0-rc1
  • Remove QuicTransportOptions.IdleTimeout #43250
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Avoid failed authN log when the endpoint has IAllowAnonymous metadata #43212
    breaking-change, area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-rc1
  • Retry BidirectionalStream_ServerReadsDataAndCompletes_GracefullyClosed #43245
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix MVC form data binding localization #43182
    area-mvc, 7.0-rc1
  • Sync output cache with API review #43121
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `bbd5404` to `9044834` #43289
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `5b909be` to `7274ec1` #43290
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • RateLimitingMiddleware updates #43053
    area-runtime, blog-candidate, 7.0-rc1
  • Cache effective policy in endpoint metadata #43124
    area-security, api-suggestion, 7.0-rc1
  • Kestrel sample: only enable delayed client cert negotiation on non-macOS #43263
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Add LF request line terminator option #43202
    area-runtime
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Add FileDownloader service for Blazor apps #43076
    area-blazor
  • Add support for running final conventions during build #43225
    area-web-frameworks
  • Improve vary-by rules #43257
  • Update branding to 7.0.0-rc2 #43240
    area-infrastructure
  • [SignalR][TS client] Send ping on connection start #42905
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript
  • Expose entire EndpointBuilder to filter factories #43255
  • CreatedResult should accept null location #42576
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Try to update SDK version after updating arcade #43147
    area-infrastructure
  • Input components two way binding + InputBase handling of unparsable inputs #40326
    area-blazor, community-contribution, .NET 8 Planning
  • Support more ProblemDetails Titles out-of-the-box #43232
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Store and reuse client certificate task #43270
    area-runtime, community-contribution
